scenario_text.value: Nnngh...
All right, we beat him!
Ungh...
Oh no, Aoi!
Aoi!

(Strange... I hear so many voices, but
I can’t see anyone’s face...)
Hey! Open your eyes! You’re safe now, okay?

The enemy is gone! We came to save you! Hang
in there!
The wounds are deep. It looks like she’s...
No! This can’t be happening! Don’t die, Aoi!

Shit! Hey! Knock it off already, Aoi! What,
are you asleep?

Stop it, Dracumon! You’ll only make the wounds
worse!
But what are we supposed to...?

(That’s strange... My body feels...so
heavy...)

Hey, somebody do something! Otherwise, Aoi’s
gonna—!

No... The light’s left her eyes. She’s
already...

Pull yourself together, Labramon! You’re the
only one who can save Aoi!
We can’t lose you both! We just...can’t!
Ah... I’m so...sorry...
No...

I hate this... It’s too much! Can’t we do
anything? Do we just have to watch her die?!
...Ah...ahhh...

(They’re saying something, and crying... It’s
dark... I can’t see anything. Am I dying?)

(Why? Was I wrong...? Please...teach me
what’s right...)

(I thought we could all work together... Make
it through this together...)

(It doesn’t matter if we’re human or not. We
just have to understand each other...right?)

(We all have to come together, become one...
Yes... I’d only just realized that...)

(Where did I go wrong? Or was I wrong from
the very beginning...?)

(Is that why I lost Saki? Lost everyone? Why
I couldn’t even protect Labramon?)
(I don’t...want to die!)
Lab...ra...mon...
Aoi...
Labramon’s...trying to grab Aoi’s hand...
Make it stop... This feels like the end...!

Miu, let them be. They’re partners... Let
them hold hands.

Mwahahaha! I get to take one of your friends
to the grave with me! What a deal!
You just don’t shut up, do you?!

(Ah... I can feel Labramon’s paw on my hand.
My partner... I...don’t want to die...)

(I want to live...not die. Was I wrong this
whole time? What was I supposed to...?)

(Idon’twanttodieIdon’twanttodieIdon’twantto
dieIdon’twanttodieIdon’twanttoDIIIIIIE!)
What the...? Takuma, what’s going on?!

Black light...seeping out from between their
hands!!!

It looks like Aoi’s trying to hold on to
Labramon...
Uh, guys... Is this really okay?

(I can feel something flowing into me. It’s
Labramon’s...energy...)
Aoi!
...Huh?
Who...who is that?
*huff, huff...*

Wh-what’s with this thing? Where’d it even
come from?
Aoi and Labramon, they’re—!
(What happened to them?!)

(Aoi and Labramon held hands just before they
died, then there was all that black light...)
(And now this thing’s standing here.)

(Meanwhile, there’s no sign of either Aoi or
Labramon. Does that mean... Could it be?)

(But wait, is that even possible? Could this
monstrous thing actually be Aoi?)

(Or this could be another attack by the
enemy?!)
(This thing standing here, could it be...?)
I think it’s her?
Can’t be her.
A new enemy?!
I think it’s her?
Aoi? Is...is that you?

Wha’?! Takuma, are you crazy?! You think...
THAT’S Aoi?! No way!

Well, it could be... They were both enveloped
in black light, and now this thing’s here.
So that really is...Aoi?
Can’t be her.

No, there’s just no way. That can’t be Aoi.
It’s completely unbelievable!
Takuma... I’m sensing Labramon...
Yes...and Aoi, too.

But that makes no sense. How can they both be
present at the same time?

I don’t know, but that’s definitely what I’m
sensing. This thing is both Aoi and Labramon.
What?! You mean that really is Aoi?
A new enemy?!

Who the hell are you? Another enemy here to
attack us?!

Takuma... This thing showed up out of
nowhere. We all saw it.

And it appeared right where Aoi and Labramon
were lying, as if to replace them.
Do you understand what I’m getting at?
So you’re telling me...this is Aoi?
All right then...
(What the—?! It just disappeared!)
Takuma, look!
Rrgh?!
It reappeared next to Piemon!
Hmph...
Ack! Ah...ah...AAAAAARGH...
What the heck? Guys, what just happened?
...He’s dead.

You...you mean to tell me Aoi did that with
a single blow?

I...I don’t understand... Why would Aoi do
that?

(It just doesn’t seem possible. How could
that strange monster actually be Aoi?)

(It killed Piemon without batting an eye.
Aoi would never do something so heartless!)

But if she took out Piemon, that means she’s
still on our side underneath all that, right?

Who knows. It may have simply been
a destructive impulse. Stay vigilant.

(I can’t tell... Is she still on our side, or
not? I have no clue.)
Um... Aoi?

I can feel Saki. She became part of this
world, and she’s cheering me on.
What?
She says I can do anything now.

I can save the world. I can fix it. I can
bring peace and harmony with my rule.

And to achieve this goal...I will remove
anyone who tries to stop me!

I see it all so clearly now, hehehe... This
was the right answer all along!
Looks like I was never wrong after all!

Hehe... My head feels so clear now! This is
amazing!

(No, this doesn’t feel right! This is nothing
like the Aoi we knew...)

Aoi? That’s you, right, Aoi? What happened to
you?

Don’t tell me this is like with Shuuji...
A dark evolution!?

Aoi, you say? No, I’ve cast off that weak
persona.
I am now called...Plutomon.
Plutomon? What are you talking ab—?
Holy crap!

(I could FEEL the intensity of that glare!
Is...is this really Aoi?!)
No need to be afraid, Takuma.

Don’t worry, it’s still me. You can relax.
I’ll save all of you.
Uh... You will?

Then maybe this is for the best! I mean, if
she protects us and fights for us...

Hah... Hahah! This is pretty awesome,
actually!
Chill, Minoru!

No YOU chill! Why are you so scared, anyway?
Plutomon is really Aoi, can’t you see?
He’s right.
I’ll save you. We’re friends, after all.

I’ve become one with Labramon. And all of you
should do the same...

Wait, what? Wh-what’s this about “becoming
one”?
What do you mean, Aoi?

Becoming one helps us understand each other
better. No more selfish behavior.

Humans, monsters...all are to become one with
me and share my feelings.
Labramon agrees, from deep down inside me.

It’s going to be all right. I will lead us on
the righteous path...of peace and harmony!

Yes! For that, I need HIS power... The power
to absorb everyone!
Wait, what...?
I think I’m missing something. Who is “he”?

Yeah, what the hell? You’re not making any
sense here, Aoi...
“His power”...? The power to absorb everyone?
She can’t mean...
No, I’m afraid she does! She plans to...
She plans to do what, Professor?
We have to stop her, Takuma!

Aoi intends to destroy the Master...and
everything else along with him!

Hahaha! So you would oppose me, Professor? In
that case...
Aoi, no! Wait! We don’t have to fight!

It’s no use, Takuma! You’re not going to
change her mind! We have to fight back!
I’ll handle this, Takuma!

(Damn it! How has it come to this? Do we
seriously have to fight Aoi?)
